channel.title: link-list on KevOps — DevOps, Cooking, and everything else I want to write about
channel.description: Recent content in link-list on KevOps — DevOps, Cooking, and everything else I want to write about

item.title: Creating a Snake Clone in Rust
item.description: Amazing step-by-step tutorial on how to create a Snake clone using Rust and the Bevy Game Engine. Definitely an article to bookmark!

item.title: Make a Language
item.description: A blog series about making a language using Rust. I really enjoyed this series which is packed with good patterns and ideas on how to parse text into something meaningful.
